title: Bug 10022: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
OB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, regardless of the user's preference settings.
EB: The "Build" action should only be enabled if the user has not selected "Perform build automatically on resource modification" in the Preferences > Workbench settings.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the Java perspective.
2. Go to Preferences > Workbench.
3. Select "Perform build automatically on resource modification".
4. Right-click in the Java perspective and open the context-sensitive popup menu.
5. Verify that the "Build" action is still enabled.

Expected result: The "Build" action should be disabled if "Perform build automatically on resource modification" is selected.
